Package unificationProblem

Class Algorithms

  • java.lang.Object
    • unificationProblem.Algorithms
  • public final class Algorithms
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the needed Algorithms as static functions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jan-Michael Holzinger & Sophie Hofmanninger

        Returns:

        private static boolean occurs2​(Variable x,
                               Variable xi,
                               SPCSet p)
        The rule (Occ) part 2.
        Parameters:
        x - The match.
        xi - The tuples to consider.
        p - the current set P.
        Returns:
        boolean true iff there is a (real) occurrence cycle.

      • constraintSimplification

        public static boolean constraintSimplification​(UnificationProblem unif)
        Calls the constraint simplification algorithm without logging.
        Parameters:
        unif - is the unification problem.
        Returns:
        true if the constraint algorithm is successful, otherwise false.

      • constraintSimplification

        public static boolean constraintSimplification​(UnificationProblem unif,
                                               java.lang.StringBuffer steps)
        Calls the constraint simplification algorithm with logging.
        Parameters:
        unif - is the unification problem.
        steps - StringBuffer where the steps are logged to.
        Returns:
        true if the constraint algorithm is successful, otherwise false.

      • constraintSimp

        private static boolean constraintSimp​(Problem prob,
                                      Matrix proxR,
                                      float lambda,
                                      java.lang.StringBuffer steps,
                                      int branch)
        The constraint simplification algorithm transforms constraint configurations, exhaustively appling special rules.
        Parameters:
        prob - problem to solve.
        proxR - is the proximity relation matrix.
        lambda - the lambda.
        steps - StringBuffer to keep track of the performed steps.
        branch - int the branch.
        Returns:
        True, if the constraints can be simplified and otherwise false.

      • ffs

        private static boolean ffs​(Function f1,
                           Function f2,
                           Matrix r,
                           float lambda,
                           java.lang.StringBuffer steps)
        This method describes the rule (FFS).
        Parameters:
        f1 - function 1
        f2 - function 2
        r - Relation matrix
        lambda - lower bound of relations
        steps - StringBuffer to keep track of the performed steps.
        Returns:
        true if method worked successful, false otherwise.

      • nfs

        private static boolean nfs​(Element n1,
                           Function f2,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<Element>> phi,
                           Matrix r,
                           float lambda)
        This method describes the rule (NFS).
        Parameters:
        n1 - name 1
        f2 - function 2
        phi - name class mapping
        r - relation matrix
        lambda - the lambda.
        Returns:
        true if method worked successful, false otherwise.

      • nn1

        private static boolean nn1​(Element n1,
                           Element n2,
                           Problem cur,
                           Matrix r,
                           float lambda,
                           java.lang.StringBuffer steps,
                           java.lang.StringBuffer branchSteps)
        This method describes the rule (NN1).
        Parameters:
        n1 - name 1
        n2 - name 2
        cur - current problem
        r - relation matrix
        lambda - lambda of the relation
        steps - StringBuffer to keep track of the performed steps.
        branchSteps - StringBuffer to keep track of the performed steps in the branch.
        Returns:
        true if method worked successful, false otherwise.

                                                         java.util.ArrayList<Element> list2)

        Parameters:
        list1 - the first list.
        list2 - the second list.
        Returns:
        the intersection list of list1 and list2.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a clone of psi.

      • appendBranch

        private static void appendBranch​(Problem origin,
                                 Problem branch)
        Appends a branch to a Problem. If the Problem has already a branch, it appends it to the branch.
        Parameters:
        origin - the original Problem.
        branch - the branch Problem to append.
